channel.title: Mining Timer?
channel.description: How can i change the time it take before u got the ores?

item.title: Mining Timer?
item.dc:creator: @k0j0e k0j0e
item.description:
@k0j0e wrote:

i got this code… is it in this? the timer???

	case 2095:
		// tin rock
			pEmote = 0x554;
		mining[0] = 1;
		mining[1] = 1;
		if (misc.random(2) == 1) {
			mining[2] = 70;
		} else {
			mining[2] = 71;
		}
		mining[4] = 438;
		break;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 11:57:19 am[/size][hr]bump* please help =(

Read full topic

item.title: Mining Timer?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

In client.java, do ctrl+f and search for the id of the mining rock. You’ll see something similar to case: ####. The #### will be the id you searched for. Underneath that, you’ll see your timer and the code that gives you one ore. Change the timer to a lower number to get ore faster. Although, your server may be different and might not be like this.

Read full topic
